basics.name: Jessica Sloan
basics.label: Senior Infrastructure Engineer
basics.summary: I am a infrastructure engineer with a passion for problem solving and automation, with a background in computer science.

work.name: H&R Block
highlights: Generate golden VM images for the company using Packer.
Assist in developing and documenting company standards for Chef.
Assist in design, and maintaining our pipelines.
Created many Inspec profiles.
Maintain and support Linux and Windows operating systems.
Diagnose and resolve a wide range of issues and services.

work.name: Codero
work.summary: Codero a web hosting company based out of Austin Texas. They offer everything from cloud computing to high-performance dedicated servers.
highlights: Support Customers via Phone, Live Chat, and Ticketing system.
Support Linux and Windows operating systems.
Support cPanel/WHM & Plesk control panels.
Diagnose and resolve a wide range of issues and services.

work.name: A2 Hosting
work.summary: A2 Hosting a web hosting company based out of Ann Arbor Michigan. They offer everything from a basic website to high-performance dedicated servers.
highlights: Worked remotely from home.
Supported Customers via Phone, Live Chat, and Support Tickets.
Monitored Exim mail queues and logs for spam and other malicious activity using nagios.
Monitored our IP address for blacklisting issues and handled them based on our policies.
Document procedures and policies for compromised accounts and blacklisting issues.
Reviewed abusive accounts and proceeded accordingly per our procedures and policies.
Worked with 3rd party abuse companies to take down malicious sites.
Created bash scripts to automate information gathering from logs.
Migrated client cPanel accounts from other hosts to our servers and internally.
Provided server-side support for hosting services.
